name: Stack City
description:
Move tower blocks to stack your opponent and prevent them from moving! Strategy is key - a large block cannot go on top of a small block. Take turns stacking until your opponent can no longer move. You win!

To play, click on one of your blocks and click on an adjacent square. Your block can only move up or down one tier at a time. Towers of blocks must have the largest blocks at the bottom and smallest blocks at the top. You can click and drag to rotate the display.
